questions: Is home X-ray same as hospital X-ray?
xray.info: X-rays create images of the inside of the body. They are commonly used to diagnose bone fractures, lung problems, and soft tissue abnormalities. Home X-ray is performed using portable low-radiation digital machines.
xray.price:
Single view: Rs. 2000
Double view: Rs. 3000
xray.report: Emergency reports are available within 30 minutes. Routine reports are delivered within 12–24 hours.

questions: Can ECG be done at home?
ecg.info: An ECG records the electrical activity of the heart to help detect heart rhythm issues and other cardiac conditions.
ecg.report: ECG graph is shared within 1 minute on WhatsApp. Final report is shared within 1 hour.

questions: Can PFT be done at home?
pft.info: Pulmonary Function Test (PFT) measures how well your lungs are working and helps diagnose breathing-related conditions.
pft.report: PFT graph is shared instantly on WhatsApp. Final report is shared within 6–7 hours.

questions: Can Holter test be done at home?
holter.info: A Holter monitor is a portable device that continuously records heart activity for 24–72 hours to detect heart rhythm abnormalities.
holter.price:
24 hrs machine: Rs. 3000
72 hrs patch: Rs. 6500
holter.report:
24 hrs Holter report: within 1 hour of completion.
72 hrs patch report: within 24 hours.

questions: Can hearing test detect hearing loss?
audiometry.info: Audiometry evaluates hearing sensitivity using an audiometer and helps diagnose hearing loss across different sound frequencies.
audiometry.price: Please contact us for audiometry pricing.
audiometry.report: Report timeline will be shared at the time of test.

questions: How can I book an appointment?
I want to book a test
Can I schedule a home test?
How do I book a test online?
booking.answer: You can book an appointment by calling 18002702900 or by logging into our portal at https://xraidigital.com/Account/Login

callback.answer: Please select 'Request a call-back' and enter your name. Our team will contact you shortly.

questions: Do you provide services at home?
What tests can be done at home?
services_at_home.answer: We provide X-Ray, ECG, PFT, Holter, and Audiometry diagnostic tests at home.

pricing.answer:
X-Ray Single: Rs. 2000
X-Ray Double: Rs. 3000
ECG: Rs. 800
PFT: Rs. 2000
Holter 24 hrs: Rs. 3000
Holter 72 hrs: Rs. 6500

questions: What payment methods do you accept?
payment_modes.answer: We accept cash, UPI, debit/credit cards, and online payments.

questions: Pregnant person room me reh sakta hai?
pregnancy_safety.answer: Pregnant individuals should not be present in the room during an X-ray procedure.

questions: How will I identify your technician?
staff_identification.answer: Once booking is confirmed, we share the technician’s ID (photo and mobile number) on WhatsApp. The technician also calls before arrival.

about.answer: We are India’s first Digital AI-enabled home diagnostic service providing radiology and cardiology tests at home using advanced portable machines.
